data.actual_result: You will get notifications for every message sent, even if you are viewing the channel
data.expected_result: You shouldn't get desktop notifications/sounds for those servers
data.short_description: When a server is on "all messages" notification by default, you will get desktop notifications + noises even though you set it to mentions only while overlay is on
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a server that has "all messages" notification settings on - Mute the server to "mentions only" - Start up a game with overlay - Have people send messages in those channels
